```{r setup, include=FALSE}

```

```{r loop fpar add function}
block_add_fps_fun <- function(x, list) {
  for (i in length(list):1) {
    for (j in length(list[[i]]):1) {
      body_add(x, list[[i]][[j]], style = list[[i]][[j]]$style)
    }
  }
  return(x)
}
```

```{r final doc build function call}
# define doc-build list that will be run

  if (
    doc_type == "notes") notes_doc_build else if (
      doc_type == "causation") caus_doc_build


#fps function call
doc %>%
  cursor_begin() %>%
  body_remove() %>%
  #block_pour_docx("sample_med_hx.docx") %>%
  block_add_fps_fun(notes_doc_build) %>%
  print(target = "FRA-report-output.docx")
```
